an8.42:1.1: “Atthangasamannagato, bhikkhave, uposatho upavuttho mahapphalo hoti mahanisamso mahajutiko mahavippharo.
an8.42:1.2: Katham upavuttho ca, bhikkhave, atthangasamannagato uposatho mahapphalo hoti mahanisamso mahajutiko mahavippharo?
an8.42:1.4: ‘yavajivam arahanto panatipatam pahaya panatipata pativirata nihitadanda nihitasattha lajji dayapanna, sabbapanabhutahitanukampino viharanti.
an8.42:1.5: Ahampajja imanca rattim imanca divasam panatipatam pahaya panatipata pativirato nihitadando nihitasattho lajji dayapanno, sabbapanabhutahitanukampi viharami.
an8.42:1.6: Iminapangena arahatam anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissati’ti.
an8.42:2.1: ‘Yavajivam arahanto uccasayanamahasayanam pahaya uccasayanamahasayana pativirata nicaseyyam kappenti—mancake va tinasantharake va.
an8.42:2.2: Ahampajja imanca rattim imanca divasam uccasayanamahasayanam pahaya uccasayanamahasayana pativirato nicaseyyam kappemi—mancake va tinasantharake va.
an8.42:2.3: Iminapangena arahatam anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissati’ti.
an8.42:2.5: Evam upavuttho kho, bhikkhave, atthangasamannagato uposatho mahapphalo hoti mahanisamso mahajutiko mahavippharo.
an8.42:3.2: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, yo imesam solasannam mahajanapadanam pahutarattaratananam issariyadhipaccam rajjam kareyya, seyyathidam—
an8.42:3.3: anganam magadhanam kasinam kosalanam vajjinam mallanam cetinam vanganam kurunam pancalanam macchanam surasenanam assakanam avantinam gandharanam kambojanam, atthangasamannagatassa uposathassa etam kalam nagghati solasim.
an8.42:3.5: Kapanam, bhikkhave, manusakam rajjam dibbam sukham upanidhaya.
an8.42:4.1: Yani, bhikkhave, manusakani pannasa vassani, catumaharajikanam devanam eso eko rattindivo.
an8.42:4.4: Tena samvaccharena dibbani panca vassasatani catumaharajikanam devanam ayuppamanam.
an8.42:4.5: Thanam kho panetam, bhikkhave, vijjati yam idhekacco itthi va puriso va atthangasamannagatam uposatham upavasitva kayassa bheda param marana catumaharajikanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjeyya.
an8.42:4.6: Idam kho panetam, bhikkhave, sandhaya bhasitam:
an8.42:5.1: Yani, bhikkhave, manusakani vassasatani, tavatimsanam devanam eso eko rattindivo.
an8.42:5.4: Tena samvaccharena dibbam vassasahassam tavatimsanam devanam ayuppamanam.
an8.42:5.5: Thanam kho panetam, bhikkhave, vijjati yam idhekacco itthi va puriso va atthangasamannagatam uposatham upavasitva kayassa bheda param marana tavatimsanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjeyya.
an8.42:5.6: Idam kho panetam, bhikkhave, sandhaya bhasitam:
an8.42:6.1: Yani, bhikkhave, manusakani dve vassasatani, yamanam devanam eso eko rattindivo.
an8.42:6.4: Tena samvaccharena dibbani dve vassasahassani yamanam devanam ayuppamanam.
an8.42:6.5: Thanam kho panetam, bhikkhave, vijjati yam idhekacco itthi va puriso va atthangasamannagatam uposatham upavasitva kayassa bheda param marana yamanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjeyya.
an8.42:6.6: Idam kho panetam, bhikkhave, sandhaya bhasitam:
an8.42:7.1: Yani, bhikkhave, manusakani cattari vassasatani, tusitanam devanam eso eko rattindivo.
an8.42:7.4: Tena samvaccharena dibbani cattari vassasahassani tusitanam devanam ayuppamanam.
an8.42:7.5: Thanam kho panetam, bhikkhave, vijjati yam idhekacco itthi va puriso va atthangasamannagatam uposatham upavasitva kayassa bheda param marana tusitanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjeyya.
an8.42:7.6: Idam kho panetam, bhikkhave, sandhaya bhasitam:
an8.42:8.1: Yani, bhikkhave, manusakani attha vassasatani, nimmanaratinam devanam eso eko rattindivo.
an8.42:8.4: Tena samvaccharena dibbani attha vassasahassani nimmanaratinam devanam ayuppamanam.
an8.42:8.5: Thanam kho panetam, bhikkhave, vijjati yam idhekacco itthi va puriso va atthangasamannagatam uposatham upavasitva kayassa bheda param marana nimmanaratinam devanam sahabyatam upapajjeyya.
an8.42:8.6: Idam kho panetam, bhikkhave, sandhaya bhasitam:
an8.42:9.1: Yani, bhikkhave, manusakani solasa vassasatani, paranimmitavasavattinam devanam eso eko rattindivo.
an8.42:9.4: Tena samvaccharena dibbani solasa vassasahassani paranimmitavasavattinam devanam ayuppamanam.
an8.42:9.5: Thanam kho panetam, bhikkhave, vijjati yam idhekacco itthi va puriso va atthangasamannagatam uposatham upavasitva kayassa bheda param marana paranimmitavasavattinam devanam sahabyatam upapajjeyya.
an8.42:9.6: Idam kho panetam, bhikkhave, sandhaya bhasitam:
an8.42:10.2: Musa na bhase na ca majjapo siya;
an8.42:11.1: Malam na dhare na ca gandhamacare,
an8.42:12.1: Cando ca suriyo ca ubho sudassana,
an8.42:15.1: Tasma hi nari ca naro ca silava,
